author: Sajid E Abdul Kader
comment: After update still issue persists. Mine phone is Xiomi A1, stock Android phone. Phone gets restarts when make call to extension number or local telephone numbers. All other applications are working fine in this mobile. In our Network other user's phone are working fine without any issues, Including some other Xiomi  model. Can you please look in to this issue...

author: Leonardo Lacerda
comment: Hi guys! I'm a system engineer and I work with features and collab applications made by Cisco. Guys this app is awesome but I'm facing a weird issue with cellphones Xiaomi A1 running Android One. After the last update when I place a call or when a receive a call, the phone stucks and restarts, usually after 5 seconds call duration. Guys you really need fix this issue.

reply.author: Cisco Systems, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. We have known this issue and the issue is in progress. Any feedback, feel free to reach us by jabberfeedback@cisco.com.

author: Paul Hirsch
comment: Better than the desktop app, but that isn't saying much.   Really not pleased with having to use Their client when all I want to use is the Jabber/XMPP messaging service.  Turning open standards into vendor lock in.  Magic! :(

author: Harold Overman
comment: Very unstable lately on Android platform. Used to be rock solid. Lots of connection problems and dropouts. Will disconnect for no reason and refuses to reconnect, even when Apple iPad and Windows 10 are working fine. After clearing all the data and re-signing it finally reconnect after about 10 attempts. Also what helps pretty consistently  is in this exact order do the following:   Sign out Go to app manager in settings and do a force stop. Relaunch it and sign in

author: Jesse Moreno
comment: Frustrating to use.  It disconnects when it wants to, making phone calls is hit or miss (mostly miss) as the callers can't hear me and vice-versa, and I routinely have to tap “RESET JABBER” to at least get it connecting to the server again.  Only reason I use this app is because work requires it.  :/

author: Andrew Temple
comment: Keep the Green and Red buttons in the same place! When I'm answering a call the Green button is on the right hand side and the red 'hang up' is on the left, but as soon as I answer I the call the red button jumps to the right. Any slight delays in the app and I end up hanging up immediately after answering!

author: Frank Brandenburger
comment: Jabber works quite fine on my Samsung Galaxy Note 8, but with some annoying issues. Cannot reject a call and the do not disturb status isn't working. Hope this will get fixed in an upcoming update.

author: Lina Lorenzo
comment: This app is great if you work from home often. It allows you to make and receive phone calls as if you were in the office. It uses your extension number and people can see you are calling, not a random cellphone number. Contacts saved on the Cisco directory are also visible in the app. The only complain I have is that this app consumes battery way too fast!

author: Kaashifa Shabodien
comment: I have a Xiaomi redmi note 4A and it doesn't work on my phone. I love Xiaomi and now I don't know what phone to purchase to get it to work. Cisco, can it work on Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 or Mi A1? The available options are limited where I am

Worked great...until 1 day it wouldn't sign in, keeps saying "you cannot login out of corporation network" even when connected to internal wifi. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling but got the same message, tried on multiple devices too with no luck. It's a shame as it was really good and useful (still works on my desktop strangely!)

author: Kellic AnonymousTiger
comment: As far as I can tell I can't sign out of this apps when I'm not at work. It's always running or signed out.  No closing the app. Uninstalling

reply.author: Cisco Systems, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. You can sign out manually when you are not at work.Jabber will not sign in automatically.

author: Dawn Eckenrode
comment: I use this for work and I love the mobility and access it orovides. I can be on Jabber any where I go, and it lets me show my status as available to colleagues, even when I run out for lunch or an errand - it's like I'm at my desk to them. Also, I particularly like the ability to see the staus of my coworkers at a glance - keeps me from wasting time trying to contact people who aren't available. I like the IP calling feature, so I can take business calls thru the app, versus my private phone line. Best work utility app ever. I would hate to do without it.

author: Hristo Petreski
comment: Very useful app. Not 100% reliable though. It happened that for some reason it shows as active/ connected but blocked itself and make me unavailable.

author: Leo Rodriguez
comment: Love it. But I can't share my screen on the desktop when I'm signed in on my mobile phone. And user status is always wrong. Say I'm in a meeting when I'm not.

author: Stuart Walker
comment: Why are the Jabber notifications coming through as media, rather than notifications on my phone (Samsung S7)?  I DON'T want the media volume turned up, but I have to to get the jabber notifications.

author: Muffaddal Mandor
comment: Not working in Google Stock Android Phone.. while calling phone is restarting automatically... Please fix the bug. Otherwise app is very good.

reply.author: Cisco Systems, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. We have known this issue and the issue is in progress. Any feedback, feel free to reach us by jabberfeedback@cisco.com.

author: Morris Massay
comment: Works quite well now, particularly making calls.   Don't seem to have functionality to stop calls getting through when in a meeting.

author: Juraj Belina
comment: Works well one One Plus 2. Android 8.0 Oreo, LineageOS sources. Last update fixed high battery drain.

author: Muhammad Umair Khan
comment: Too much delay at times. Overall, ots fine not very good. Not as good as Whatsapp or Skype.
Calls rarely connect successfully. Appears to have connected i.e. call time starts counting, but the line is silent. Using Oneplus 3T

author: Jaime Enrique Rodriguez Villate
comment: When using it to make phone calls always the quality drops after around 5 sec; it is so annoying that I have to hang up and call again several time due to this situacion.

author: slyspace wolf
comment: Work for the NHS and we have to use this service for the moment but I am proactively trying to move us away from this terrible service as I cannot join group chats I am a member of on my laptop

author: Jorge Solla
comment: Connection problems all the time, no audio on calls, consumes a lot of battery, messy importing contacts... slow responding UI (pressing a button... 4 seconds later application responds...) definetely a very bad application
Unable to update password.  Searched all settings and web.  Your support site says it is not possible on mobile app.  Useless if you company requires new password at regular intervals.

author: Josh Cross
comment: Latest version is crashing right after sending a message.  I've tried clearing cache, reinstalling, rebooting phone and still a problem. Running Android 8 on OnePlus 3t.

author: Ramesh Iyer
comment: When the account password has changed, the app still allows the user to login with the old credentials and there is no clear path to sign in with the new password.

reply.author: Cisco Systems, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. When you sign in successfully, Jabber will get a token to connect service. If you change your password, token is still available. You will lose connection with servers after token expired. The expired time is configured by your admin.

author: Ahemd Ibrahim
comment: On MI Max2 while making calls the sound is not working at all

Serious battery usage! This app while being used can drain my brand new phones battery from 100% down to 10% in a matter of 2hrs. While that may seem okay since it's a video conference tool, I don't think FaceTime or what's app video uses nearly as much juice. Some optimization is needed here!

author: Brandy Chase
comment: Cannot sign in on my Samsung S7 Active, haven't been able to for months now due to updating my device.

author: Wayne Ritchie
comment: Login doesn't work! Forgets credentials regularly. Just as bad as the desktop app.

reply.author: Cisco Systems, Inc.
reply.content:
Thanks a lot for your feedback. 
Please send a problem report to jabberfeedback@cisco.com. We will check the reason.

author: Ashwin Balaji
comment: one. not getting connected everytime. two. why don't you update like whenever it's opened it gets sync up with the older messages. it's not useful without that.

reply.author: Cisco Systems, Inc.
reply.content: Shall we know what is your connection issue? That chat history is configurable from server side. Your admin has been disable feature of load chat history. Any feedback, feel free to reach us by jabberfeedback@cisco.com.

comment: Takes over my whole phone. I just want to use it for messaging. The setting to disable call management doesn't disable it.

author: Bobby Thomas
comment: Can't register phone services on my phone (OnePlus 5-Oreo) but the desktop app works fine.

reply.author: Cisco Systems, Inc.
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback. 
Jabber Android configuration is different with Jabber Windows. You should confirm with your admin if he had add this permission for you to use Jabber Android to connect telephony service.

author: Julia Sykes
comment: I never hear it ring at my end but they hear me fine. So I always call out.

author: Matt Cragun
comment: I wish there was a way to remove the constant app notification in my task tray. I just want it to run in the background and be ready when I need it.

author: Irakli Machabeli
comment: Worst app ever, drains battery on android 8.1 even when not using it at all.

reply.author: Cisco Systems, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. Jabber will continue connecting the server when not using it. Can you give more info about the issue you met? Any feedback, feel free to reach us by jabberfeedback@cisco.com.

author: Josh Clark
comment: Getting better, the previous update screwed it up, this latest updated seems better though

author: Benjamin Barr
comment: Love it... the sync issues got fixed finally. Very nice user interface.

reply.author: Cisco Systems, Inc.
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback. 
Jabber can sync conversations between all your devices when they are both online. If you can't sync, please check if the jabber on your device is online that time. If yes, please send us a problem report, thanks.
BTW, Samsung S8 is a beautiful and great device, good choice~

author: Amr Hany
comment: I upgraded my device to Note 8 and now I can't hear any audio during phone calls, the receivers don't hear my voice either. Any help?

author: David Neilson
comment: Battery use was a problem on my old phone (could have been the phone) it's now able to run most of the day without considerable drain.
